purpose: Facilitates the creation of standardized machine learning research papers using Typst templates.
principle: Utilizes Typst, a modern typesetting system, to offer templates for various machine learning conferences and journals.
reusability: Templates can be easily adapted for different machine learning conferences and journals, offering a plug-and-play experience for researchers.
limitations: Limited to the Typst typesetting system; users unfamiliar with Typst may face a learning curve.
name: typst-templates
description: A list of paper templates in the area of machine learning.
highlight: Provides a comprehensive collection of Typst templates for machine learning paper submissions.
